participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.background: i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

content.text: hello. i'm 18 and i'm pretty lonely.
